de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.preprocessed.knn

Class RandomSampleKNNPreprocessor<O,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object

    @Reference(title="Subsampling for Efficient and Effective Unsupervised Outlier Detection Ensembles",
           authors="A. Zimek and M. Gaudet and R. J. G. B. Campello and J. Sander",
           booktitle="Proc. 19th ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, KDD \'13")
public class RandomSampleKNNPreprocessor<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends AbstractMaterializeKNNPreprocessor<O,D,KNNList<D>>
    Class that computed the kNN only on a random sample. Used in:

    Subsampling for Efficient and Effective Unsupervised Outlier Detection Ensembles
    A. Zimek and M. Gaudet and R. J. G. B. Campello and J. Sander
    In: Proc. 19th ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, KDD '13
